Text.Page:
Between the kumases and the patrols, I haven't got soldiers to spare. And now I've got orders to send aid to Sandwalker Refuge! Good thing you're here.

Head west up the road and report to {@LinkCreature:224#1009#Stadrian}.

About time! The last reinforcements I got were three librarians and a tailorâ€”about as helpful alive as they were dead.

We'll make good use of your skills.
